attributes.action: increase subsidies for people looking to install environmentally friendly power generation technologies to their homes and pass legislation requiring their installation to new build homes where appropriate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A modern photo-voltaic (PV or solar) system, in combination with a small wind turbine, could easily provide the power to run a small to medium house, especially a ground/air source heat pump for heating purposes.

Any excess energy created can be sold back to the energy companies or stored in battery systems for low light/wind operation.

These measures would reduce emissions, reduce bills (low income houses would benefit greatly) and reduce britains dependency on imported energy (gas, oil etc.).

Whilst i care about the environment and my part in protecting it, i cannot afford the costs involved in installing these systems into my house.

The costs of these systems can be offset in construction costs for new build developments, reducing the need for government grants for retro-fitting the technologies mentioned.
